campaign_overview.strategy: **Messaging Strategy and Key Themes**  Core Value Proposition: High-quality products and services.

conditions: User isn't in other active campaigns
exclusions: User has opted out of marketing emails
User has hard bounced email address
User has completed target action in last 24 hours

dynamic_content: Product images based on cart items

campaign_overview.full_plan:
**Campaign Overview and Objectives**

Campaign Name: Cart Abandonment Recovery

Objective: To recover abandoned purchases and increase conversion rates among General customers.

Primary Goal: To send targeted and personalized messages to customers who have abandoned their carts, encouraging them to complete their purchases and increase revenue.

**Target Audience Profile and Segmentation**

Target Audience: General customers who have added products to their cart but have not completed their purchase within 1-4 hours.

Segmentation: Based on purchase history, browsing behavior, and cart abandonment frequency.

**Messaging Strategy and Key Themes**

Core Value Proposition: High-quality products and services.

Key Messages:

1. Convenience: We care about your time and want to make sure you have the best shopping experience.
2. Urgency: Don't miss out on the products you need - complete your purchase today!
3. Value Reinforcement: Our products are high-quality and worth every penny.

Tone: Professional

**Email Sequence Plan**

Email 1: Gentle Reminder

* Subject: Don't forget about your cart!
* Purpose: To remind the customer about their abandoned cart and encourage them to complete their purchase.
* Timing: 1 hour after cart abandonment

Email 2: Value Reinforcement

* Subject: You've got this! Complete your purchase now!
* Purpose: To reinforce the value of the products and encourage the customer to complete their purchase.
* Timing: 24 hours after cart abandonment

**SMS Sequence Plan**

SMS 1: Urgency Creation

* Purpose: To create a sense of urgency and encourage the customer to complete their purchase.
* Timing: 1 hour after cart abandonment

SMS 2: Final Incentive

* Purpose: To provide a final incentive for the customer to complete their purchase.
* Timing: 3 days after cart abandonment

**Trigger Conditions and Automation Rules**

Trigger Conditions:

* Cart abandonment within 1-4 hours
* Cart value consideration (e.g., above/below a certain amount)

Automation Rules:

* Send Email 1 1 hour after cart abandonment
* Send Email 2 24 hours after cart abandonment
* Send SMS 1 1 hour after cart abandonment
* Send SMS 2 3 days after cart abandonment

**Personalization and Dynamic Content Strategy**

Personalization:

* Product-specific messaging
* Cart value consideration

Dynamic Content:

* Product images and descriptions
* Call-to-action buttons

**Success Metrics and Optimization Plan**

Success Metrics:

* Recovery rate
* Revenue per email
* Conversion rate

Optimization Plan:

* Monitor and analyze campaign performance regularly
* Adjust messaging, timing, and segmentation based on performance data
* Continuously test and improve the campaign to achieve maximum results

**Deliverables**

1. Campaign Overview and Objectives
2. Target Audience Profile and Segmentation
3. Messaging Strategy and Key Themes
4. Email Sequence Plan (subjects, purposes, timing)
5. SMS Sequence Plan (purposes, timing)
6. Trigger Conditions and Automation Rules
7. Personalization and Dynamic Content Strategy
8. Success Metrics and Optimization Plan

emails.subject: Here's a high-converting email for Euron.One's cart abandonment campaign:
emails.preview_text: Here's a high-converting email for Euron
emails.body:
Here's a high-converting email for Euron.One's cart abandonment campaign:

Subject Line: Complete Your Order: 15% Off Your First Purchase

Preview Text: Don't miss out! Complete your order within the next 24 hours and receive 15% off your first purchase

Email Body:

Hi {{first_name}},

We noticed you left some amazing products in your cart! We want to make it easy for you to complete your purchase and start enjoying the benefits of your new items.

At Euron.One, we pride ourselves on providing top-notch products and services that make your life easier. Our products are designed to simplify your daily routine, and we're confident you'll love them.

To make things even sweeter, we're offering you 15% off your first purchase if you complete your order within the next 24 hours. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!

Here are the items still waiting for you in your cart:

 [Product 1]

 [Product 2]

 [Product 3]

To complete your order, simply click the link below:

Complete Your Order Now

This link will take you directly to your cart, where you can review your items and check out easily. Don't forget to use your 15% off code at checkout!

If you have any questions or need assistance, our customer service team is always here to help.

Best regards,

The Euron.One Team

Call-to-Action: Complete Your Order Now

This email aims to create a sense of convenience and ease by emphasizing the benefits of completing the purchase. The 15% off offer adds an element of urgency, encouraging the customer to take action within the next 24 hours. The email also includes social proof by highlighting the quality of Euron.One's products and services, and provides a clear and easy way to complete the order.
emails.full_content:
Here's a high-converting email for Euron.One's cart abandonment campaign:

**Subject Line:** Complete Your Order: 15% Off Your First Purchase

**Preview Text:** Don't miss out! Complete your order within the next 24 hours and receive 15% off your first purchase

**Email Body:**

Hi {{first_name}},

We noticed you left some amazing products in your cart! We want to make it easy for you to complete your purchase and start enjoying the benefits of your new items.

At Euron.One, we pride ourselves on providing top-notch products and services that make your life easier. Our products are designed to simplify your daily routine, and we're confident you'll love them.

To make things even sweeter, we're offering you 15% off your first purchase if you complete your order within the next 24 hours. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!

Here are the items still waiting for you in your cart:

* [Product 1]
* [Product 2]
* [Product 3]

To complete your order, simply click the link below:

**Complete Your Order Now**

This link will take you directly to your cart, where you can review your items and check out easily. Don't forget to use your 15% off code at checkout!

If you have any questions or need assistance, our customer service team is always here to help.

Best regards,
The Euron.One Team

**Call-to-Action:** Complete Your Order Now

This email aims to create a sense of convenience and ease by emphasizing the benefits of completing the purchase. The 15% off offer adds an element of urgency, encouraging the customer to take action within the next 24 hours. The email also includes social proof by highlighting the quality of Euron.One's products and services, and provides a clear and easy way to complete the order.

sms.message: Here's a high-converting SMS message for Euron.One's cart abandonment campaign:
sms.extract_sms: Here's a high-converting SMS message for Euron.One's cart abandonment campaign:
sms.full_response:
Here's a high-converting SMS message for Euron.One's cart abandonment campaign:

"Hi {{name}}, don't miss out! Your items are waiting. Complete your order now: [easy completion link] Text STOP to opt out"

Character Count: 137

This SMS message aims to create a sense of urgency by highlighting that the customer's items are waiting, while also providing a clear and easy-to-use completion link. The message is concise, professional, and includes an opt-out option. The hook is the personalized greeting, which addresses the customer by their name. The use of the exclamation mark adds a touch of friendliness and approachability, while the clear call-to-action encourages immediate action.

sms.message: Here's a high-converting SMS message for Euron.One's cart abandonment campaign:
sms.extract_sms: Here's a high-converting SMS message for Euron.One's cart abandonment campaign:
sms.full_response:
Here's a high-converting SMS message for Euron.One's cart abandonment campaign:

"Hey {{name}}, don't miss out! Limited stock remaining. Complete your order now and receive 10% off. Text 'COMPLETED' to redeem. Text STOP to opt out. 🛍️"

Character Count: 139

This SMS message aims to create a sense of urgency by mentioning limited stock, while also offering an exclusive 10% discount to complete the order. The use of "Hey {{name}}" adds a friendly touch, while the clear CTA ("Text 'COMPLETED' to redeem") encourages the customer to take immediate action. The inclusion of "Text STOP to opt out" ensures compliance with SMS marketing regulations.

This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!\n\nHere are the items still waiting for you in your cart:\n\n* [Product 1]\n* [Product 2]\n* [Product 3]\n\nTo complete your order, simply click the link below:\n\n**Complete Your Order Now**\n\nThis link will take you directly to your cart, where you can review your items and check out easily. Don't forget to use your 15% off code at checkout!\n\nIf you have any questions or need assistance, our customer service team is always here to help.\n\nBest regards,\nThe Euron.One Team\n\n**Call-to-Action:** Complete Your Order Now\n\nThis email aims to create a sense of convenience and ease by emphasizing the benefits of completing the purchase. The 15% off offer adds an element of urgency, encouraging the customer to take action within the next 24 hours. The email also includes social proof by highlighting the quality of Euron.One's products and services, and provides a clear and easy way to complete the order."
    }
